channel.title: Job Market on Luke M Perez
channel.description: Recent content in Job Market on Luke M Perez

item.title: APSA 2017, Job Market Edition
item.description: Heading to ‘Frisco for APSA this week.1 Not much planned save for flurry of job market interviews and meetings with old colleagues, advisors, and friends. To be sure, I planned this trip not without some degree of trepidation. It’s a lot of money to plan for a conference and since I’m not presenting, I am ineligible for reimbursement within my department. Of course, I suspect this job market project is similar to nearly any field: new suit, flights, hotels, etc.
